article_title: A Monthly Check for Life? Don’t Forget Inflation
article_text:
When it comes to annuities, simplicity sells: More investors this year are turning to a plain-vanilla annuity that offers a fixed monthly check, right away, in return for a lump-sum premium payment.

The rising popularity of the single-premium immediate annuity may please critics of more-complicated, fee-laden annuities. But some financial planners warn that, in their desire to lock in a predictable income, investors might be...
